reviews.review:
[h1]어렸을적 숨박꼭질을 해본적 있으십니까?[/h1]
누구나 한번쯤은 다들 해본 경험이 있을겁니다.
그때 느꼈던 스릴감에 나오는 웃음들. 결코 쉽게 잊혀지지 않습니다.
하지만 성인이 된 지금.. 
다시금 즐길 수 없는 그때의 놀이를 체험해 볼 수 있는 기회가 생겼습니다.
그것은 바로 " Dead by Daylight " 를 즐겨보는 것 입니다.
겉보기에는 13일의 금요일, 할로윈 같은 호러영화물에 가까운 게임으로 보이는데,
숨박꼭질이 왠 말이냐? 할수 있을겁니다.
물론 그런 호러적 요소들은 충분히 안고 있기는 하지만, 
장시간 즐기다보다보면 어느덧 공포는 익숙해지고, 
살인자에게 잡히지 않으려는 스릴감이 더 강해집니다.
때문에 하고 싶어도 너무 무서워서 못하겠다 하시는 분은,
걱정은 접어두고 한번 즐겨보시길 바랍니다. :)
가장 먼저 가까운 친구들과 함께 즐겨보는 것이 큰 도움이 될 것입니다.

[h1]게임은 알고보면 상당히 단순합니다.[/h1]
먼저 생존자 4명으로 구성된 팀과
살인자 1명으로 총 5명이 모여야 게임을 시작 할수 있습니다.

[b]생존자들의 목표는[/b] 현재 처한 상황에서 탈출하는 것입니다.
탈출 방법은 맵 곳곳에 있는 발전기 같은 기계를 5개를 가동시키고,
맵 끝에 있는 출입문을 열고 빠져나가는 것입니다.
이 과정에서 게임 트레일러를 보면,
위기에 처한 동료를 구해주느냐, 그냥 외면 하느냐 선택의 기로에 놓일수 있습니다.
이 게임에서 가장 흥미진진한 요소가 알고보면 이것인데..
아마 실제 게임에 임하면 나름 상당히 드라마틱한 고민을 하게 될 것입니다.
동료가 있어야 탈출이 빠를텐데, 
동료를 희생하고 벌은 시간으로 좀 더 길게 생존할 것인지..
만약 구하게 되면 나중에 더 큰 보상을 기대할 수 있습니다.

같은 상황에 처해 
이때 동료가 나를 구해주지 않는다고 해도 원망하지 않으셔도 됩니다.
죽게되면 게임에서 빠져나가 다른 게임에 바로 참여할 수 있으니까요.
그리고 아무리 플레이를 잘 못했다고 하여도, 이 게임은 성과제 입니다.
가장 못한 플레이어에게도 한 만큼의 보상은 주어집니다.
그러니 열받는다고 강제종료는 하지 마시어요.

[b]살인자의 목표는[/b] 생존자를 잡아 제물로 바치는 것입니다.
살인자에게는 한편으론 패배가 없습니다.
생존자들을 얼마나 많이 제물로 바치느냐 하는 것으로
점수획득의 차이만이 있을뿐이지 
생존자를 모두 잡지 못했다고 졌다고 생각할 필요가 없습니다.

[h1]제가 생각하는 이 게임의 가장 큰 장점은[/h1]
누가 이기고 지고가 없다고 봐도 무방하다는 것입니다.
생존자들이건 살인자건 자신이 한만큼 보상을 받는 성과제입니다.
다만 생존자들에겐 각자의 생존이 목표이고,
살인자는 방해하는 술래 역할을 맡으면서 생존자를 많이 잡을 수록 
큰 점수를 획득하는 것이 이 게임의 핵심 포인트라고 보면 됩니다.

얻은 점수는 경험치가 되어 각 캐릭터마다 레벨을 올리고,
게임에 도움이 되는 스킬 및 장신구를 장비 할 수 있습니다.

이 게임의 한가지 훌륭한 점이,
멀티플레이 게임 전용이면 보통은
주변에 같이 할 사람이 있어야 할수 있는거 아니야 하는데..
이 게임은 철저히 협동을 빙자한 개인플레이라고도 볼수 있습니다.
다만 본인이 어떻게 플레이 할지 매번 고민하게 만든다는 것입니다.
때문에 멀티전용플랫폼이라고해도 
혼자서도 충분히 재미있게 즐길수 있습니다. :)
https://youtu.be/PHCUoY3PEmU
게임을 보다 오래 즐길수 있는 요소 중 또 하나는 
랭크제라는 경쟁요소가 있어 
생존자의 경우 생존을 3회 연속으로 하게 되면,
랭크가 1씩 상승하게 됩니다. 레벨과는 다르게 계산 되어집니다. 
이 때문에 반복적인 플레이를 해도 하나의 동기가 되어
게임을 플레이함에 있어 성취감을 기대할 수 있습니다.

[h1]하지만 이 작품에는 치명적인 단점이 있습니다.[/h1]
아무래도 자금이 부족해서였을까.. 확실하지않지만 게임 서버가 없습니다.
살인자가 호스트가 되고, 
생존자는 그 살인자 방에 접속하여 게임플레이를 하는 방식입니다.
때문에 살인자가 게임 접속이 도중 끊기거나 
그냥 이유없이 나가버리는 비매너 플레이를 한다면,
방에서 플레이하고 있던 모든 유저들이 패널티를 받게 됩니다.

또 한, 서버가 없기 때문에
친구들과 생존자 그룹을 짜서 살인자방에 같이 갈수가 없는 상황입니다.
초대는 오직 살인자만이 가능합니다. 살인자가 호스트니까요.
아마.. 게임이 상점내 매우긍정적인 평가를 받을 수 있는데 불구하고
복합적인 평들이 발생한다면 아마 이 이유 때문이 클겁니다.
그리고, 너무 한결같은 사운드도 아쉽긴 하지만, 
시끄러운 환경에서 게임 플레이를 할 수 없는 게임이기에 
어느 정도 무마 되는거 같긴 합니다.

앞으로 게임 유지보수를 잘하여 이런 단점들을 개선하고,
컨텐츠의 부재도 걱정되는 편이기에 
개발진들이 머리 맞대어 좋은 아이디어를 짜서 도입하였으면 합니다.
현재 게임내 하단에 컨텐츠 부분이 적혀있고 비활성화 되어있기 때문에
새로운 컨텐츠는 분명 나타날 겁니다. 

[h1]비평을 마치며... [/h1]
개인적으로.. 이 작품은 정말 신선하고, 잘 만들어진 게임이라고 생각합니다.
적당히 호러를 즐길줄 아는 분들에겐 
기회가 된다면 한번쯤 꼭 플레이 해보시길 권장드리며,

앞으로 게임이 어떻게 업데이트가 될지 기대하게 만듭니다. :)

Pros
-Able to make friends game and play
-fast paced
-fairly good graphics
cons
-don't get reward off of kill your friends lobby
-when your internet may go off for the shortest time kicks from game entirely

Ein tolles Spiel mit Suchtfaktor nur leider haben die Entwickler den Sinn von Alpha und Betaphase wohl nicht gänzlich verstanden und sich entweder nicht getraut den Release nach hinten zu datieren oder hatten mehrere Bretter vorm Kopf. So manch anderes EA Spiel hat deutlich weniger Bugs und grobe Schnitzer im Spiel als dieses "Fertige".
Das Spielprinzip ist toll, die Umsetzung ist auch gut, aber die lange Liste an Bugs/Crashes/Lücken fühlen sich an wie Katzenhaare auf einem Stück Wassermelone... 


Nach 22 Stunden Spielzeit sind folgende Bugs/Chrashes bei mir aufgetreten:
- Spielchrash beim reparieren der Generatoren mit anderen zusammen (4x aufgetreten)
- Spielchrash beim entschärfen einer Bärenfalle (1x)
- Spielcrash beim Haken endphase (1x)
- Spielcrash beim Versuch in die Lobby zu kommen (2x)
- Mein Char tot aber die Endgrafik kam nicht, Spiel für die anderen somit auch nicht abgeschlossen (hier half nur Spiel über Taskmanager schließen)

- Bug rausschmiss aus der Lobby (sehr sehr oft)
- durch die Gegend fliegen, passierte nach dem gerettet werden vom Haken (3x)
- durch Wände/Autoreifen glitchen (2x)
- durch den Kopf vom Char schauen (sehr oft im Schleichmodus)
- vom Generator reparieren in den Schleichmodus gehen -> Char "springt" in die Luft ( ca 10x)
- rumfliegende/hängende Holzteile (sehen aus wie die Splitter von einer zerstörten Holzpalette)

Sollten die Entwickler auf die Community und deren Bugreport eingehen, dann gebe ich auch gerne einen Daumen hoch.

DEAD BY DAYLIGHT!
В игру я слишком много не играл(купил для payday 2 ;D)
Но восномном мне игра понравилась очень отличная графика сделаная на движке unreal engine 4...
В этой игре можно играть как за выживших так и за маньяка.
Я бы сказал что за выжившых играть интереснее,но мне нравятся оба класса.
Больше всего играл за маньяка.Мне нравится всех убивать :DD.
Советую эту игру тем у кого нервы не слабые потому-что можно и побомбить и т.д.
Игра мне нравится очень советую.
10 МАНЬЯКОВ ИЗ 10!!!

Очень классная игра!
Интересно поиграть за обе стороны. 

Советую, конечно, советую!
Remove The Wraith or ddos

Edited to account for new patches.

TLDR: I really like this game, the only iffy parts are minor ranking/technical issues. If things like achievements not working occasional animation bugs, and some items being unbalanced bother you, then wait a little while until they're fixed.

Positives: 
[olist]
[*] [u]The gameplay is fairly well balanced[/u], although it may not seem like it when you first start out, as some things can only be  learned through experience. But at the end of the day you can complete your goals as either a survivor or killer and have a good chance as either. 
[*]  The [u]random generation[/u] of map and elements means that both sides need to consider the map layout in their actions. Survivors don't automatically know where the generators are, and the killers don't automatically know where survivors are likely to camp items, as chest locations change.
[*]  [u]All the killers have different playstyles[/u] and all the survivors specialize in different things. A match where the trapper is the killer will be played differently than a match where the wraith is the killer. A match with 3 lvl 15 jakes will be played differently than a match with all 4 characters.
[*] [u]If you screw up as a survivor, it is not an immediate game over[/u], your friends can save you or you can salvage the situation. This makes it slightly easier on new players.
[/olist]

Negatives: Gameplay Edition
[olist]
[*]  [u]The tutorial teaches the main points and nothing else[/u]. While there is only so much strategy a tutorial can teach in a multiplayer game, some basic elements, like all the uses of items, are only stated on the wiki outside of the game, and not in the tutorials.
[*] [u]Currently, the game is geared towards the selfish survivor[/u]. You are much more likely to escape if you repair generators while the killer is busy with your friends, than if you risk life and limb to save them.
[*] [u]Balance issues[/u], most of which are minor: Any new survivor player will have difficulty if the wraith is the killer on enclosed maps, as they won't have the perks to know when he's coming and the enclosed areas mean they can't visually see him. The flashlight is very underpowered, and about as effective as it would be in real life. 
[/olist]

Negatives: Tech Edition
[olist]
[*] [u]No queueing with friends[/u] (As of 6/16/2016). You can host private games, but you and 2 friends can't all queue in a group to get the full number of people.
[*][u] Ranking issues[/u]: Rank is currently not an indication of skill, and there are 2 main categories of players; those who rank up indefinately, and those who don't care about rank and are continuously at rank 20, even as their characters get more and more skills and perks. (I'm not an amazing player, but I have a lot of perks as a crutch, and if ranking was alright, myself and quite a few others would probably be at rank 15-18 instead of at 20, shredding the poor newbies.)
[*] [u]Minor bugs[/u], some of which are funny, (animation bugs), and some of which are annoying. It is possible for a hatch to be invisible and uninteractive even after the requirements to open it are met. If the trapper places a trap under a hooked player, then their teammates can't disarm it because the "unhook" prompt takes priority over the "disarm" prompt.
[/olist]

[u]16 июня 2016г:[/u]

Пока что нет! Игра совсем сырая, вроде бы релиз, но играл всю бету с 30 мая - 14 июня и ничего не изменилось после релиза игры. Единственное изменение - после релиза игры в игре нет онлайна. Когда была бета, все постоянно играли в нее, поэтому можно было играть за обе стороны(выживший и убийца), а сейчас за убийцу в лобби вообще никто не заходит, а за людей тоже не с первого раза найдешь лобби хотя бы с 1 человеком. В бете было много ошибок и одна из них - ошибка при попытке присоединиться к лобби, пытаясь играть за человека, сейчас она все осталась, также часто выскакивает. В бете было 2 карты, а после релиза игры тоже 2 карты только другие. Но есть и свои плюсы после релиза игры и один из них это то, что увеличили радиус удара игрока, а то раньше надо было прямо в упор в спину подойти, чтобы это сделать. Короче суть в том, что пока вам лучше не тратиться на эту игру, но если у вас есть лишние деньги и вам делать нечего, то свободно покупайте. Deluxe издание ни в коем случае не покупайте! Оно не дает вам никаких преимуществ.

[u]25 июня 2018г:[/u]

За 2 года игра претерпела сильные изменения. Dead by Daylight стала одной из самых популярных игр у ютуберов, да и вообще в целом. Улучшили механику игры, добавили множество контента и не прекращают радовать новыми обновлениями и DLC. Но что было тогда, есть и сейчас. Дисбаланс в сторону выживших. Выжившие как были сильнее манька, так и остались.Насколько бы маньяк не был бы вкачан и силен, благодаря недоработкам механики игры настолько же вкачанные выжившие, или дажее слабее, все равно победят, если умеют играть в эту игру. На эту тему можно много написать, что, почему и как так получается, что выживший всегда имеет преимущество, но тем, кто играет, итак это ясно. Раньше хоть можно было побеждать изично за маньяка, когда выпускали новое DLC на него, пока его не пофиксят, но сейчас уже не так, на примере клоуна расскажу: ура, вышло новое DLC - новый маньяк и выживший, я его купил сразу же, пробовал на тесте, было неплохо. После я зашел в игру и сразу же приступил к убийству выживших, первая карта была больница (кстати единственная играбельная карта за клоуна, потому что он медленный и ему нужны узкие пространства где можно замедлить бутылкой выжившего и поймать) я в ней кое-как, но убил всех выживших, это было не очень сложно, но все же они были с аддонами и предметами, дальше мне несколько раз подряд попадались карты с открытой большой местностью, где клоун просто ничего не может сделать, к тому же еще выжившие порядком выше меня на несколько уровней, с сильными предметами и аддонами к ним, а у меня маньяк на этой стадии еще был сырой. И что ты не пытайся делать, ты проигрываешь. Даже если вкачать его сразу на максимум, то против таких же на максимум вкачанных выживших да и даже более слабых, но умеющих играть вы ничего не сможете сделать.

[B]..........
[URL=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/35050278/]Страница Куратора[/URL][/B]
plain to the ass to wait 4 players to get the game started.

I bought the deluxe edition and got the extra two copies. I sent them both to two of my friends but one of them did not work. He said he accepted the gift then when he checked his library the game was not there.

TLDR: Game has been out for 2 days now. Balance, connection issues and lack of communication are huge problems at the moment. Isn't currently worth the time and money BUT has HUGE potential to be incredibly fun with some work.

Adding to this review, game has been patched twice now. The most recent patch was a knee jerk reaction to low level players complaining. The intent of the patch seems to make low level play much easier for the killer. It has made it almost trivial at higher levels of play. The devs had an overwhelming amount of feedback on what should have been done but instead changed the game to cater to the lowest level of players. Meanwhile disconnects, lag switches and hacks still are present in far more games than they should be. 
I still don't recomend spending money or time on this, i regret doing so.

Too much bug. Hunter too OP. AND ALWAYS THE SAME THING : 

- Hunter catch someone
- Hang
- Wait until survivor die
- Repeat and win.

Hallo Community hier ist mein Reviev zu DBD.
Also als aller erstes muss man sagen, dass es sich hierbei um ein Early-Access Spiel handelt!!!!!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------                                                                                                           
Positiv
- Schicke Grafik (unreal Engine)                            
- Gute Soundkulisse                                                
- Enorme Spannung und hoher Nervenkitzel
- Ständige Arbeit am Spiel (Bugfixes und Co.)
- Mit Freunden macht es unheimlich viel Spaß

Negativ:
- Online Ranking (Killer/Überlebenden LVL) funktioniert noch nicht richtig
- Noch wenige Karten (Ich glaub 4 o. 5)  und Charaktere (3 Killer, 4 Lebende)
- Noch kein Matchmaking mit Freunden und Randoms möglich 
- Nicht allzu abwechslungsreich

Ich empfehle dieses Spiel, da es gerade mit Freunden viel Spaß macht. 
Die Entwickler haben sich Mühe gegeben und das ist bestimmt noch nicht alles was sie entwickelt haben, es wird sicherlich mehr rauskommen (Maps,Killer,Charaktere,Tötungsmöglichkeiten usw.)

Buggy as hell, only fun with friends. 

bugs include:
floating and falling out of world (if you fall out of the map there is no kill zone)
getting stuck in trees and rocks when useing a block
Jump a barrier but the killer hits u from the otherside
cases of menu being buged ( volume setting took my mouse and was changing my setting while in game)
and more that i haven't seen in my few hours

Very repative gameplay...

overall not really worth it

[b]First: Yes, the game has bugs and issues (animations, not being able to do some actions but you don't know really why... for example.)[/b]

Still, Dead by Daylight is a pretty cool game if you want to play a game without shooting and throwing grenades at everything. You have to think about how to perform in term of survival, and sometimes, you'll have to make choices.
Would you help a fellow survivor hooked for a sacrifice or would you focus on the actual objective (repairing generator in order to open the exit gate) ? Can you have an entire trust for your team mates since you can't communicate ?

As a Killer, would you rather camp and be sure that you kill at least someone (but you let other people win since they're focusing on stuff) or would you play methodically  and always have a good sight of your victims, just in case someone's smart enough to save him ?

That's why I really like this game. So yeah, of course it's not perfect, and you can't do a lobby with your friends at the moment (so people are trying to join their friends but for that, you have to spam as many lobbies as you find, making the wait really annoying sometimes), but still, this is a perfect game to play and test your abilities to handle random players and still have fun at the same time.

Games aren't the same since player killers vary from camper, really sadistic players and sometimes, passive ones.

Поманьячил в Dead By Daylight.
Когда-то мне попалась в руки Evolve, где четыре охотника пытались выбить дух из зверушки в лесу. И всё там было бы хорошо, но любая ошибка зверя приводила к концу матча, а аж четыре неубиваемых охотника вели себя, как душе угодно. И вот обратная ситуация - четыре жертвы пытаются спастись от маньяка, неуязвимого и очень страшного. И у жертв здесь есть право на ошибку.
Их задача - открыть двери, включив электрогенераторы, и сбежать. Задача монстра с тесаком же проста и незатейлива - найти и убить всех. Найти поганцев непросто - они пытаются ползать по лесу, стараясь не шуметь, прячутся в траве и некими точками тела ощущают приближение убийцы. Но кто из нас идеален? Одно неосторожное движение - и генератор громко лязгает клапанами. Сидящие рядом на камне вороны шумно вспархивают в небо. Раненые стонут из кустов, привлекая маньяка. Быстрый бег оставляет в мягкой болотистой почве след. Да и против такого чудовища, появившегося поблизости, у выживающих есть лишь один метод - сесть подальше и надеяться, что он пройдёт мимо. Можно даже с минуту сидеть в пяти метрах от охраняемой им точки, пока он наворачивает круги рядом. Но рано или поздно мимо он не пройдёт, и тогда попытается убить.
Догнать щуплого городского жителя спортивно подготовленному садисту довольно легко, однако габариты не позволяют ему быстро протискиваться через окна и нагромождения досок, а значит, по сильно пересечённой местности жертва может сбежать. Но зато, отследив траекторию и рванув наперерез, вполне можно достать этого надоедливого городского жителя топориком по макушке. Бег здесь - это настоящая дуэль ловкости, находчивости и хладнокровия. Сколько раз я видел, как расчётливый маньяк выходит прямо в лицо студенту, от страха навернувшему полный оборот вокруг сарая. Как девочка-скаут каждый раз, когда убийца пролезает через окно, нагло дразнит его прямо через подоконник уже с другой стороны. Как догадавшийся, где прячется сочное мясо, монстр делает вид, что ничего не заметил, но в последний момент оборачивается и голыми руками хватает подорвавшуюся жертву за одежду. И тут уж кому-то придётся повисеть на крюке для мяса, рассчитывая только на остальных, которые, может быть, придут и спасут его. А может, займутся генераторами, пока мясник сторожит добычу...
Dead By Daylight - это игра уловок, баланс в которой далёк от идеала, но которая может подарить вам массу интересных ощущений. Она сыровата, но на это не хочется обращать внимание. Главное - что она сможет занять вас, и этого времени будет не жалко.
It's pretty fun as the killer if people don't dc CAUSE I HIT THEM ONCE LIKE OMG DONT

Great game, fun, cool atmosphere. Don't worry about the negative reviews since the devs are already making a ''group'' mechanic that's going to be put into the game. They seem like awesome guys, I suggest you check out their dev q&a etc.

Actually going to seriously review this game after 2 years of owning it. 


It's got its bugs, its non dedicated servers, its toxic community, but as you can see from my playtime, I always keep coming back to it. Unlike other games that have attempted to move in on the assymmetrical horror game genre that DbD has (ex f13 and the latest DBD clone Soul at Stake), it somehow keeps me coming back to play more and more. It's a lot of fun with friends, and even at the moments of bad experiences with other players, I've had good ones and made a lot of new friends. A lot of funny ones and terrifying ones (looking at you Pig/Myers). 

Some of the things that I don't like are the auric cells. I think the cosmetics are super cool, and I've managed to get a lot of them from a gift card. Like, super cool cosmetics for both survs and killers. I happily support the devs, but I feel the prices are too steep. And the "best" skins for each character are locked behind these auric cells only. But no lootbox system, so there's that. 

As of the 2.0 update, the pallet vacuum was removed, making it a bit more fair. But looping (a surv running around a pallet multiple, able to bend corners easier because of their smaller hitbox and waste the killer's time) is still a problem. Killers stomp at low ranks and are super weak at high ranks (rip me trying to get to rank 1 killer). SWF is a huge problem and often puts the killer at a huge disadvantage. 

Put a killer against a 4 man SWF, who all know how to loop and have Discord or other Voice chat with all meta perks and the killer is lucky if they get even one kill. On top of this, genrushing is a huge issue. Even with the perk Hex:Ruin or Hex: Huntress Lullaby or any gen slowing perks like Overcharge or Pop Goes the Weasel, gens get done most of the time way too quickly. 

SWF needs a change, perhaps a notification for the killer of who is grouped and who is solo. In exchange, I don't think the killer should be able to see a surv's profile or information (play time, achievements, etc). It gives way too much away. 

Besides those issues, and the occuring hilarious bugs/frustrating glitches, it really is a fun game at heart and I'd recommend it to anyone.

This is a game that I wish I could give a netrual for it is fun but it's also not fun.

This game works by pitting four players against one killer. The goal of the four is to power five generators one exit gate and escape. The goal of the killer is to brutally murder and sacrifice the four survivors.

Games history

Game was so infavor of the survivors at release it was pretty sad. Survivors cried that killers were OP and killers got nerfed.
Survivors continued to cry that killers were OP and the devs tried to fix something but broke the game by making killers able to hit through walls and lunge infinite distances. (It was quite humorus nerfed shortly after.)
Devs finally addressed "infinites" for the first time (Infinite: The ability to remain 100% safe in the face of the killer they will never be able to get caught by the killer as long as they run this "infinite") by shutting some windows at random. It didn't solve the problem. Survivors still ran infinites the game was still in favor of survivors and survivors still cried Killer OP.

Then the game changer happened. A new killer. The Nurse. Now the Nurse is not fair. As someone who was rank one the entire time I played both survivor and killer. I will say beyond a shadow of a doubt Nurse is broke. The reason for this is the nurse can travel large portions of the map in very short amounts of time. Can go through walls. And has very little down side. Playing as the Nurse stops infinites of every kind and requires innovative play from the survivors. Playing against the Nurse means you have to learn to play the game not just abuse infinites and because people are not willing to learn how to play they just want to abuse exploits the Devs don't fix. They cried killer OP (Not Nurse op Killer OP still.) Shortly after the Nurse released (3-6 weeks) I quit playing the game and quit following it.

It has now been two years and I have come back to try this game again. And one thing I can say for absolute certain. The game has not changed. Survivors still run infinites. The killer is still at extreme disadvantages. If you win as killer survivor cries Killer OP. If you look at forums Survivor cries killer OP. And if you play Nurse (The only killer that has a chance with the way the game is) people will find every excuse to rage and call you names.

And even among all of this I still prefer to play killer. All of the killers I've played are fun to play however, it comes down to the choice of the survivors. Do you want to win? Then you will win. Do you want to just have fun? You probably won't win but you'll enjoy your game.

As a Survivor if all four survivors start the game immediately start doing generators then before the killer can hook a single person three generators will have been completed. With one person going to save the hook and the other two doing generators the last generators will be completed before the killer finishes sacrificing someone. The game is dicated by the choices the survivors make. Do you cry killer OP? Ok killers get nerfed. Did you want to win? Yes? Ok the game is over in 5 mins and Survivors win. Do you want to abuse infinites and exploits? Yes? Well they'll never be fixed because you're too busy crying killer OP.

For these reasons I would give this game a Netrual.
Sadly my choices are yes or no. So it will remain a no until such time that devs truely fix all of the infinites and exploits survivors abuse so that all killers have a chance. Not just one.
P.S. Devs are trying. Which is more than most games.

Below I'll have my review of the game since launch. My current stance on DBD is very conflicted. I enjoy the game alot but recent things done by the developers have just put me off of the game. The wording they used made it seem like they had no part in the creation of NFTs and that the models being used for NFTs were entirely a thing done by the licence holders.

Their words exactly.

"When we work with our licensing partners, we provide them with in-game models as well as Chapter keys. They are free to use these however they see fit as the rightful owners of these characters."

Tonight? They say this

"Behaviour worked with Boss Protocol over several months to adapt in-game models for use as NFTs and approved them prior to the release of Pinhead in DbD. The NFTs have a chance to grant access to the #Hellraiser chapter of DbD."

They lied. And I just can't get down with that. Any of my good-will or faith in the developers has been shattered. For now, I cannot recommend this game when the developers lie to their player base, ignore them and openly support NTFs that are extremely damaging to the environment.

For now, avoid this game. If you REALLY want to get Dead by Daylight, get the original content with the earnable Iridescent Shards to get the original DLC content and just avoid licensed content for the time being.

I'm extremely disappointed. Behaviour, this isn't a small hiccup, this is a major issue.

이전 평 다 싹 갈아엎고 다시 써본다.

우선 컨셉? 컨셉은 좋다. 아니 매우 좋다. 신선하며 재미있다.
문제는 컨셉이 아니다. 인터페이스나, 각종 버그들이 문제지. 솔직하게 얼마나 시간이 걸리던 버그 싹 잡고 게임을 냈어야 됬는데, 최소한 클로즈 베타 이후로 1달정도 잡고 클로즈 베타때의 버그는 다 없앴어야 됬다.

왜인지 모르겠지만 결국 정식오픈은 그 이름에 무색하게 클로즈 베타때 있었던 버그들이 꽤 많이 남아있었다.

물론 이 회사가 버그를 안고치냐? 아니다. 노력을 하고 있을거고, 인디회사라고 알고 있는데, 인력이 많이 부족할 수 있다

실제로 업뎃마다 꾸준히 버그들을 고친다. 히드라 같이 하나를 고치면 두세개씩 튀어나와서 그렇지.

인디회사, 적은 인력이고 내가 코딩쪽 전문은 아니지만, 버그 잡는게 만만치 않는 일인 것 정도는 알고 있다. 버그 잡는데 오래 걸리는거 이해하고, 버그는 잡았는데 다른 버그가 튀어나오는 것도 이해한다.

물론 이해는 하지만, 게이머 입장으로서 그걸 감수하고 게임을 해야 되는 이유는 없다.
그냥 버그 천치인 게임 감수하고 할 정도로 컨셉이 좋다 생각하면 하면 된다.
나같이 버그 같은거 못버티는 사람은 안하는걸 추천한다.

Ich fang mal so an, Ich bekomm ein Youtube Video mit dem Inhalt von einer Beta zu dem Spiel Dead by Daylight.
Gekauft habe ich es mir paar Tage vor dem Reales, ich war gespannt was nun auf mich zu kommt. 

Am 14.06.2016 um 19 Uhr gingen dann die Server Online, Ich war alleine. 
Alleine das Intro Movie hat mich gefesselt. Ich war richtig heiß als Killer durch die Welt zu rennen und andere Leute daran zu hindern zu Gewinnen. Also Spielte ich die Erste Runde als Killer und musste feststellen dass es nicht so einfach aussieht wie man Denkt. Ich Verlor die Erste Runde und versuchte mich dann als Überlebender zu Flüchten. Mit 3 anderen Leuten die ich zuvor noch nicht gesehen oder gehört habe. 
Wir haben die Runde gewonnen. Anscheind hat der Killer genau so viel Erfahrung gehabt wie ich am Anfang. 

nun sind 2 Tage vergangen und ich finde das Spiel immer noch Hammer. 

Es gibt 4 Überlebende zur Auswahl und 3 Killer 
Jeder Killer hat andere Möglichkeiten um die Leute zu Jagen

Killer 1 kann Fallen Stellen die wiederum von den Überlebenden wieder entschärft werden können. 
Killer 2 kann sich Unsichtbar machen und läuft dadurch schneller 
Killer 3 hat eine Kättensäge

Natürlich hat Jeder Charakter in dem Spiel ein Eigenen Level Fortschritt. 
Was dir ermöglicht dir Dinge freizuschalten und diese zu benutzen. 
Zum Beispiel mehr Blutpunkte am Ende der Runde. 
Oder die Chance auf eine bestimmte Karte zu Joinen. 

Eine kleine Sache fehlt mir dennoch das Onlinespielen mit Freunden gegen einen Fremden Killer (Lobby Funktion)
Soweit ich gehört habe wird dieses Funktion bald eingefügt und dann geht das es Richtig los. 
Somit hat man dann die möglichkeit sich auch Taktiken auszudenken wie man am Besten vorgeht. 

Im groben und ganzen geb ich dem Spiel dafür das es eine Alpha ist 7/10 Punkten.

Alleine die Atmospähre wenn man das Herzklopfen hört weil der Killer in der nähe ist und du ihn aber nicht sieht ist Gold Wert.
I like it, I will play more. But first I have to comeplete a quest... "The Quest To Find Friends"

Tam beklediğim oyun tarzıydı ve aynı mantıkla çıkacak 2 rakibinden önce çıkıp akıllılık etti. 

*Oyunda 1 katil Max. 4 kurban var. Kurbanlar motorlara güç verip kapıdan kaçma derdinde, kasap ise et derdinde :D.

*3 Farklı katil var. Biri görünmez oluyor(En kötüsü :(), Diğerinin korkunç testeresi elinde koşuyor, Bir tanede ip iri katilimiz var ki öbür 2si varken neden o katili oynayalım ?

*Hangi oyunda hangi katilin olduğunu bilemiyorsunuz buda katili tespit edene kadar daha fazla korku demek. Tespit etmekte ayrı bir korku.  :D

*Oyunu betasında 5 saat çıktıktan sonra 1 saat oynadım ve düşüncem şöyle oldu: "Oyun kendini tekrar etmez mi ki ?"
Ediyor ama katilin nerden çıkacağı nasıl ondan kurtulacağınız gibi faktörler bilnmiyor ve her oyuna girdiğinizde bir bilinmeyenin içinde olup çekişmeli bir hayatta kalma mücadelsine giriyorsunuz. Katile gelince ise koşuşturan kurbanları yakalamak elim sende oynamak gibi bir duygu ve hoş :DDDD

Kısaca indirimde ise kesinlikle alın. Değilse bekleyin düşünün sizin için değer mi alın. Ben hala 13.Cuma oyununu bekliyorum mesela bu oyun 13.Cuma için pratik olmuş gibi.

I cannot believe this game has gotten such poor ratings. Let me say a few things that may change you're mind about this game.

First off it is so worth the $20 and I can tell the dev team really cares about the game. I have had loads of fun playing this and honestly I will spend many more hours killing running for my life. I think one of the reasons this game has gotten so much flack is because it is not user friendly as in, the game is not EASY. There is a learning curve and all the no skill 12 year olds that cant play it and die within 30 seconds of the match rage. The game takes real skill, and requires you to think and pay attention too the entire map. This is a very unique game that is worth the buy. 

YES THE GAME NEEDS WORK.

I have noticed some bugs and some features that do seem to be lacking, but overall the gameplay is solid.

Not bad but a few gameplay and aesthetic choices bother me. Namely, the supernatural element.  It just feels out of place here. Cloaking? Demonic branches coming from the sky? If you like stealthy sneaky beaky like gameplay like splintercell and MGS this is the game for you.

If you like to hack and slash helpless victims to death this is the game for you.

If you like to scream in terror and piss yourself every 5 minutes this is the game for you.

If you like to parkour through windows and over debris this is the game for you.

If you like to go invisible and uncloak behind someone like your predator, this is the game for you.

If you like to hang people on hooks and watch them squirm around this is the game for you

If you like to have fun, this is probably the game for you

Gots some bugs, but fun to play every now and again. In my opinion, it beats most games of this type of style (Friday the 13th not included.) I still have a blast playing it when I am in the sneaky snake mood.

Three years ago I gave a very positive review for this game at release, with a Pros vs Cons Comparison alongside a "What I Want In the Future" list. I must say that after all this time, Dead by Daylight has surpassed my list far beyond. With many more new and iconic characters to play with either from the game's own morbid but alluring lore or from popular horror culture. Each new map is better designed than the one before, and anything that was released before is kept in meta with balance patches and reworks. 

Though Micro-Transactions have been added to the game, they were provided to players mostly to enlarge the previously barebones cosmetic options for Survivors and Killers alike. Dead by Daylight is currently at a great spot as it constantly provides worthwhile new content while making sure that the game respects its core values as a grim horror experience. 

Last time I had said that Dead by Daylight is my favorite horror game. Though I have played many new possible candidates, that statement has still not changed. This game is an experience that every horror fan should at least give it a try to.
A mini friday the 13th :)

Ever watch a horror movie, and yell at the characters- "NO! Don't go in there!" Or "It's a trap!" Or "leave him, save yourself you idiot!" Well, now you have to make your own decisions in that very situation.

This game is like a Texas Chainsaw Massacre simulator. If you are a horror fan, such as myself, I highly recommend this game. It is incredibly atmospheric, intense, and full of dread. Playing as a survivor or as the killer are both fun, but there is a certain primitive thrill that I get from hunting people down and instilling fear in their souls with the revv of my chainsaw!

Each map, while all having a similar feel and similar props, feels unique and very horror-movie-esque (eg- cornfields, abandoned farms, etc). The game is surprisingly balanced I feel. This game isn't without problems, like matchmaking and the graphics being mediocre, but it doesn't take away from it's charm or the fun.

I recommend this game, definitely worth the price :D Especially for horror fans.

Uzun süredir oyunun betasını takip edip oynayan birisi olarak şunu söyleyebilirim ki oyunun tam sürümü ile beta arasındaki fark daha fazla killer olması ve harita seçeneğinin fazla olması. Betadan sonra çok fazla bir yenilik göremesemde oyunun amacı çok güzel.

Oyunda anlık 9-10 bin oyuncu bulunmakta fakat garip bir durumdur ki ben oyun lobisinde çok fazla birilerinin gelmesini bekliyorum ve lobiye girişlerde çok fazla sıkıntı yaşıyorum. Lobiden atma, lobiye almama..vb
Eğer 5 kişi iseniz oyun aşırı zevkli geçiyor fakat özel oyun kurmuş olduğunuz için karakterinize exp gelmiyor ve bu durumda karakterinizi geliştiremiyorsunuz.

Henüz 2 gündür tam sürüm olan bu oyunun 1-2 hatası olsada konsepti süper.
